mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, email) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where userid = #{userid} and userpw = #{userpw}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw=#{userpw}, username=#{username}, email=#{email} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select userid, userpw, username, email, regdate, updatedate from tbl_member
